website_summaries.verdict: Silicone mold makes 9 mini popsicles, as well as candy and smaller frozen desserts.
pros: Makes perfect size pops for kids, lighter snacks for adults
No hot water needed to release pop
use hands to warm up, free snack instead
cons: Manufacturer says mold is not dishwasher safe
Molds needs more solid bottoms, stand/holder possibly hard to  grasp

customer_reviews.title: Knock off item -- BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This item is knock off. The box came without the name Zoku anywhere on the box or the item. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: HSHOW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! My one year old has no problem holding & eating them by himself. The size is perfect for him to eat it before it starts melting all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Page

customer_reviews.title: More Than Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the larger ones were not available and with grandchildren coming, we needed more molds. So, I took a chance on these mainly because I love the brand. I wasn't sure about them when they arrived. They looked too small to be able to satisfy a sweet tooth. But I was so wrong. They are perfect and they are adorable and they look so darn cute in the little hands of a little person. Also, seriously, you could freeze plain water and the kids would love them! They don't make a a lot but they are just enough. I'd definitely purchase again and probably will. Oh, and they are easy to use and they freeze fast.
customer_reviews.author: O. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler loves ice but I hate her chomping down on it and thought these would be perfect. I was right! We blend some frozen fruit and veggies (beets are great) with water and turn them into "popsicles" - sugar free, of course. She loves them! We give her one after school while we prep dinner. They can be messy, so make sure you have a silicone bib that catches the juice. We also give her a bowl and when she's not eating it, she knows to put it in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: FitGirlInFlight

customer_reviews.title: But these are great. To remove them
customer_reviews.text: I will never purchase another brand other than Zoku. I've purchased other generics but none of them work right, the popsicles don't properly release. I make homemade popsicles every summer and everyone loves them. I'm allergic to High Fructose Corn Syrup and can't consume most products at the store. These are delicious. The actual "popsicle" molds don't work well. But these are great. To remove them, just push up from the bottom and they pop out. Just DO NOT throw the stick away or you are screwed because Zoku doesn't sell replacement sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Simple popsicle molds.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the convenience of the silicone which allows you to push up the popsicle after it's frozen very easily. The popsicle itself is very small for a toddler. Really can't use it for teething as a small child probably would not be able to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoesnow

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently sized popsicles for toddler
customer_reviews.text: The base is easy to clean by hand with soapy water. We fill each pop holder with yogurt + fruit blend and let it freeze overnight. Each pop pulls out easily for an adult, and bit more effort for a toddler. Great size for my almost three-year-old to munch on for her dessert or le goûter, and now she's able to get some easy protein in. Really happy with this purchase, just in time as the weather heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Claremore

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Got the mini pop molds to make juice popsicles for my three year old. She loves them, no issues with the sticks coming out and they are a great size for her (though she sometimes will go back for a second one). The molds are easy to use, easy to clean, easy to pop the frozen treat out. Ordered another set (different shapes) because these will surely be used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: shawn m espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The plastic look very thin and it has a very strong plastic smell. Also missing some sticks when I received it. I don’t feel safe making anything for my baby to eat in low quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The best there is, but it's all about the smiles and "woah!" comment you get when people pull their popsicle out.
customer_reviews.text: This is all about the experience. It makes adorably perfect pops, but the real magic is when you have someone pull one out. They don't expect what happens next and without fail the look of complete shock and amazement comes next. Doesn't matter how old, it's the same thing and everyone wants to know where we got it. Original was purchased for a high-end chocolate producer in SF that wasn't getting used and made its way into our house. We have 2 now and they're better than anything else I've used for making popsicles.
customer_reviews.author: ryanaround

customer_reviews.title: Mini Pop Molds great for toddlers & small popsicle fans
customer_reviews.text: This is for the Zoku Mini Pop Molds. So glad we bought this. It makes pops slightly smaller than a golf ball. Perfect for a toddler's small mouth and short attention span. To fill up all 9 molds takes about 1 cup liquid total. We've had good luck with simple apple juice. Dimensions of the whole thing are approx 10 in x 7 in, and around 3.5-4 in high. The pops are in there securely enough that you need dexterity and some hand strength to pull them out (i.e., easy for an adult, but challenging for really small kids).
customer_reviews.author: arlington shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny hands and tummies.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 very active little guys with some pretty unhealthy Popsicle addictions, being that's its summertime and in the mid 90's it's understandable. These little things help stave off the mom guilt (lol) of the over sugary store bought versions. Sometimes I fill them with a quick yogurt fruit smoothie or low sugar juice and since they are small they freeze pretty quickly. They sit quite nicely in my pull out drawer freeze and I love the fact that I don't need to run them under water to release. In the winter months I'm sure I'll use them for more chocolatey type candy treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Mini Pops - good product, error in description.
customer_reviews.text: I would buy it again, or would give as a gift. Mini Pop Molds hold 0.75 oz each, not the 2-3 listed in the product description. I'm pretty happy with the product - easy to clean, pops come out of the mold really easily WITHOUT needing to run it under water. You can't see it in the picture, but the little sticks are slightly tapered & have a notch in them to help reduce the likelihood it will slip off as it melts. (But they're tiny, so even a toddler is not likely to have much melt before it's eaten.)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best popsicles!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many popsicle molds... every time I walk through a grocery store I grab whichever I see. I finally took the time to read reviews and “splurge” on a quality one. I am SO glad I did! My youngest son is now three and has a popsicle addiction!! I love being able to make our own and control what goes in them! He’s even willing to try new mixtures because he made them himself. Super easy to clean, easy to make and use! It doesn’t really take up too much freezer space either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect treat.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying find a cool pop mold for a dear friend going through chemo. This mini pop mold was the perfect fit. Petite, easy to handle, easy to remove, and fun to fill with different flavor options. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vitreau

customer_reviews.title: Very very good design.
customer_reviews.text: Very good design and very pleased. I had purchased another design/product originally but ended up purchasing this as a replacement. This really is a great design. I just wish that they sold replacement sticks here on amazon after my kids lose them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size frozen treat
customer_reviews.text: These molds are just the right size of frozen treats for young children. They pop out of the mold easily. The mold is easily cleaned. I liked it so much that I purchased a second one. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JK*Endeavor

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 3 year old. She loves Popsicles and I wants to be able to give her a relatively healthy "treat" after dinner. I love that they are small (ping-pong ball sized) and I can make them healthier than store bought Popsicles. I make them with 100% juice and I plan on trying to make frozen yogurt pops soon. The Popsicles come out of the molds very easily and clean up is easy too. Very highly recommended for toddlers. Probably would be too small for older kids, but I'm very happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They are fantastic. I purchased them so I would not eat a large amount. Blend bannana, cocoa, peanut butter and coconut. Perfect size snack and very easy to take out. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Drouin

customer_reviews.title: Ice pop maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking we could make small ice pops for the kids. Unfortunately once the kids start eating the pop and it begins to melt, the ice pop falls off the holder. We still try use it bc the kids like the small ice pops and once the remainder falls off, they are ok using their hands to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Mold is not a square shape! Otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: This popsicle mold works really well, and the popsicles are a good size for teething baby/toddler. Only surprise was that the mold is not a square shape, more of a diamond, which I can't see much benefit to - makes it a little harder to find space in the freezer for, but I guess it's a little narrower than it would be if square, so maybe it saves space that way? Just thought it was a strange design choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Holmstrand

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! They're the perfect size for my 18 mo old toddler twins to have a nice cool snack without it being too much. The container isn't really big so it takes up a flat space in the freezer and not an awkward "if I place it here, will it tip over?" None of that. Not to mention the handles are just big enough for a kids' hand to hold the pop. I would buy this again if needed. It even makes a nice adult sized sweet treat without going into large quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Cowles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount and size for little ones
customer_reviews.text: We love these for our 3 year old. We have a hard time getting him to drink enough water, we fill these with watered down juice and he loves it. Going to try it with some fresh fruits. These are the perfect size and amount for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Best popcicle mold yet!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! I just received mine a few days ago, and we've already made (and eaten) 2 batches of popcicles. They literally "pop" out of the silicone molds with no mess or hassle. They are very small, which is perfect for my 2 year old daughter. The first batch, I just used a few of those squeezable fruit pouches for toddlers to fill the molds. It literally took less than a minute, and they turned out terrific. The second batch, I puréed bananas, PB, and Greek yogurt, and then stirred in some mini chocolate chips. We will be using this all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands and mouths!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for babies and toddlers. I purée up fruits and veggies and freeze into “treats” for my almost 2 year old. He absolutely loves his popsicle treats and I love that they’re packed with healthy foods. Very easy to fill, remove, and clean. The tray is very stable in the freezer, even when precariously perched on bags of frozen peas.
customer_reviews.author: Zeek

customer_reviews.title: Easy awesome pops-not for yearlong humidity
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to get out! Not too big so they are not getting too much of the sweet pops. My only negative is when in constant humid weather (tropical climate) they grow mold along every little crease and hole and line.
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMomma

customer_reviews.title: Zoku mini pop mold
customer_reviews.text: I waited for the price to drop to just under $14 but I would purchase them again at a higher price. They are AWESOME. I previously purchased theand while the size was okay it was seriously difficult to release the pops. Using this was easy and a great size. I just poured smoothy I made into them and they came out great. Perfect for my 2 and 4yo! Planning to purchase Zoku brand again.
customer_reviews.author: cocokru

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for teething!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I can not tell you how grateful we are to have this!! When I first started using it I was still pumping and I would make breast milk pops and my LO (little one) LOVED it! And now we use it for just ice pops for teething. Every morning my LO runs to the freezer and wants his ice pop! They help so much! I am looking forward to making little flavored pops on day ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Egetoe

customer_reviews.title: For all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I am am making these for cocktails tonight: insert 1 pitted cherry or 1 blueberry, pour in cranberry juice.... Insert in a vodka cocktail or just enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I’ve made ice cream popsicles about three times now and they are the perfect size for a toddler or a small treat. They remove easily and clean easy.
customer_reviews.author: CBT

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I originally purchased the regular sized ones and they were too big for my toddler. Not that they were a bad product, I will be keeping them for when my boys are bigger. These small ones are perfect for toddlers, easy to hold! I didn't know what to think when the molds are silicone and they just pop out but it works great!! Best for teething and sore throats, just making ice pops.
customer_reviews.author: Kylara09

customer_reviews.title: Good bye frozen store sold pops!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves her healthy, 100% pure juice pops! I think the mini pops are much better than traditional larger pops due to the melt factor. The only negative is that we lost 3 of 9 sticks in the past few weeks. Zoku has the 9 replacement mini pop sticks listed on their website for $4.99. I just wished Amazon/Zoku would make these available through Amazon. I didn't deduct any stars because the product is great, deserves 5 stars, and replacements are available. I even ordered two more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids get their veggies in frozen smoothies. They go the the freezer and pull these out themselves! Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teething baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I make apple juice pops as well as food pops for my almost 10 month old and he loves it! Also helps with his teething pain also is the perfect size for his little hands to hold!
customer_reviews.author: Stsierra

customer_reviews.title: Fantadtic
customer_reviews.text: Best popsicle ever! We use them everyday! So easy my kids are making popsicle a with fruit juice all the time.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Great For kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these! We make Popsicles for our kids all the time. These molds are easy to clean and easily makes Popsicles. I love the silicone. The Popsicles easily slide out, even when completely frozen. The size of these are perfect for both my 15 mo old and 3 year old. We somehow lost the red holder of this a while back so we purchased a second one. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Mini-Pop sticks are VERY small :(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these...perfect portion size, LOVE the easy-removal, unfortunately the sticks are a chocking hazzard IMO. Even with direct supervision, my LO would easily fit the entire stick in his mouth. Maybe they would be better if the drip-guard was larger? Great product concept, just not comfortable using it so we will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: mommyofONE :)

customer_reviews.title: ... u are looking for popsicle molds this is THE BEST around. seriously
customer_reviews.text: if u are looking for popsicle molds this is THE BEST around. seriously. i fell in love with this when i saw it online. my son is 8 months old and i use puree popsicles in it! he LOVES the banana and yogurt ones i make him! these are very very easy to use. and they are VERY easy to take out once theyre frozen if i could give this product a million stars i would i will use this over n over n over again !
customer_reviews.author: Lauramayzing

customer_reviews.title: Great for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: With the heat wave hitting hard, we wanted out 9 month old to experience the wonderful joy of healthy home-made popsicles that weren't the size of her arm. We've only used this mini-pop maker only once- but it's very user-friendly so far! We love it. The pops come out of the mold with ease, and they are the cutest little things, ever! Perfect size, too for a little babe or toddler! Very easy to clean, and we are very happy with our purchase. I wish that our big popsicle maker was this good! They need to make one like this for adults, please...
customer_reviews.author: Tulapearl

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about knock offs because of some of the reviews on here but appears to be the real brand.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan S

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These molds are so easy to use! I love that they make smaller popsicles - sometimes a little treat is all you need. They also come out of the molds really easily. My son has loved exploring flavors. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: TLMom

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They are the perfect size for an ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are the perfect size for an after dinner treat. I usually use leftover smoothie from the morning and make fruit pops. Easy to clean. Even when one of the sticks fell out because I had it slanted in the freezer I just popped out the pop part and ate it with a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha S.

customer_reviews.title: my son loves his popsicles!
customer_reviews.text: This tray is super easy to use and the popsicles come out with ease. I made them for my son who is teething and he absolutely loved it. The handles are easy to grasp for him at 10 months. Know that these are definitely small pops, meant for smaller babies, not toddlers. Overall, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LJE

customer_reviews.title: Great for popsicles
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great quality. They are perfect for homemade kids popsicles/frozen smoothie. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi T

customer_reviews.title: Made iced tea ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did was test by making iced tea ice cubes. They unmolded easily and cleaning the mold was a snap, What an ingenious way to unmold. Silicon has come a long way! Will try for others next, like "adult" lemonade popsicles as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: D B.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this mold for juice pops
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the greatest product....just fill with whatever you want to fill it with....juice...yogurt...whatever and freeze...my little great granddaughter loves to have a juice-sicle after supper...good for her and not full of sugar....small enough to quench the need for a bit of juice sweetness...love it!!!! She can help fill them and can get them out herself....everything is wonderful about these Zoku Slow Pops Molds!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cheap healthy ice pops
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for healthy ice pops. Works great with yogurt, apple juice, smoothies and more.
customer_reviews.author: Barianna

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Sticks Missing
customer_reviews.text: My mold arrived with none of the drip guard sticks. Looking at the reviews, I see 2 recent orders with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun little pops!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool! Super easy to remove and a fun size. Very small like lollipops. I ordered one from eBay and it turned out to be a fake. Since then, I've noticed that there are lots of knock offs. Real ZOKU has the logo on the base and on each little popsicle stick, and of course, on the box and included paperwork. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great tiny popsicle maker!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfectly sized for my two year old. I puréed strawberries and froze them, and she gets one every morning if she stays in her bed until 6am (parenting goals for the win!) They are easy to get out and and she loves the little handles. Hoping to use them with my son in a few months too, he will be starting solids next month.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Just right for 18 month and 3.5 year old grandchildren Pop out so fun. Bought two more for gift for friends with little ones!
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have older kids (5&3) but messy kids! These are amazing. Love them. Super easy to remove and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: hunter1gbr

customer_reviews.title: Makes the most perfect little pops
customer_reviews.text: Makes the most perfect little pops! The mold is great. So easy to make and taking the popsicle out was a breeze. Just a simple tug and out it came. No need to run under water or anything. The size of the mini pops is perfect for my baby, who loves cold things for her teething gums. You can also use this to make treats without the stick, like chocolate candies. LOVE this product and so glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: ycm

customer_reviews.title: Pops unmold easily and very easy clean-up!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! Everything I've frozen in them comes out easily, including coconut cream and just pureed fruit/veggie baby food. Easy to clean. Also, if you have rings from Ring Pops, those work in this mold, too. The size is just right for my 20 month old to have one. My almost 6 year old generally wants 2. So she can have 2 different flavors, if she wants.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya Raysberg

customer_reviews.title: Great little molds
customer_reviews.text: I love these little mini pop molds. Very easy to use and then just put in the dishwasher to clean. Handles do not slip out of popsicles. About 1/3 regular popsicle size.
customer_reviews.author: B Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love It!  Very Versatile and Works Great!  Only Wish I Could Order Extra Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: We have had fun with this this summer! Perfect size pops for all the kids, 4-16! I love them too! We fill with juices or iced coffee! My kids like to do water with a big green grape popped in too! Fun, easy to clean. Molds pop out very easily! My only complaint is that I cannot order extra sticks, we already lost one of those little suckers! Otherwise, worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: wndzbug

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! The silicone base allows the Popsicles to easily come out with no struggle. I bought this mold for my almost 2 year old and she is able to slowly eat her Popsicle before it melts everywhere. It is also the perfect size to store in my freezer. Can't say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison M Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don't regret this purchase....
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this popsicle tray for my toddler. So easy to make popsicle in and the cleanup is breeze. These popsicle forms should be the new standard sold in stores etc. I love them and will be purchasing more! 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to use. Mini pops were easy to remove. Both my kids love the novelty of it. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SMALL: GOOD FOR BABIES
customer_reviews.text: They are super small. This would only be good for a teething toddler. I made them for my 4 year olds and they were done eating it before I even had a chance to return the rest of the tray to the fridge. They are teeny tiny. I would not use this for a child older than 2.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean
customer_reviews.text: These are the best popsicle molds if you’re looking for a small popsicle that works great and is easy to clean! Loved using them for my Preschool class!
customer_reviews.author: momof boys2

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething 11 month old!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! The mini molds are perfect size for my teething 11 month old. She can hold them in her little hands and loves them! They pop out so easily too. Will definitely buy more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! So easy to use, they pop out of the mold so easily and easy to clean. They are small but they are perfect for my 12 month old. I will be buying the larger size when he is bigger
customer_reviews.author: Corey T.

customer_reviews.title: They ACTUALLY work!
customer_reviews.text: First popsicle molds I've used that ACTUALLY work. I've bought so many molds in the past and ended up throwing them all out. Ikea, the grocery store's, pricier target brand, dollar store, etc. These are awesome. I bought the mini molds and they are perfect for younger children as they finish them before they start spilling. I'll be buying the same company's other molds in the future for adult pops.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: ... 22 month old loves Popsicles this mold is the perfect size for her
customer_reviews.text: My 22 month old loves Popsicles this mold is the perfect size for her. I wish the handles were a little easier for her to hold on to but other than that we love it. We own several of the zoku products and love them all!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy28

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pop molds! I've made yogurt pops for my 8 month old son. These are perfect size for the amount of yogurt and he is able to hold them without any problems. I love how easy it is to get the pops out and clean up is a cinch! I would totally purchase these again and recommend them for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Terrific popsicle molds
customer_reviews.text: The Zoku Slow pop molds are great! My 3 year old grandson was easily able to take the popsicles out of the molds and the popsicle stayed on the "stick" while he enjoyed the treat. The popsicles are the perfect size. The only downside is they don't have a "lip" so there could be some drips, but I think they're great and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! My son has food allergies and I'm able to make him ice pops with the ingredients that he tolerates and they're the perfect size for a little treat.
customer_reviews.author: JAMEN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this miniature Popsicle mold. Are use it to make yogurt Popsicles for my kids. They are small and a good way to have a healthy, frozen treat without all the sugar. My kids can easily remove the Popsicles from the mold.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY - these get molded if you don't use them all the time! WASTER OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: A little spendy for me, but WELL worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We love these! I know it's a bit spendy, however it's so worth it if you have a little one they are perfect, if you are an adult they are perfect too and it's fun for the little ones the shape and size. And the Popsicles are super easy to pull out. I'm glad I splurged and picked these up!
customer_reviews.author: Lydiar R

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 at a time, one is not enough!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pop molds! Actually the adults finished the first batch before I could give to my grandson! Made another batch! totally recommend. I had never made the pops, it was a great experience! Best way to have a healthy and sweet snack available at all times. Easy
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!! Yogurt pops - 1 small carton of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! Yogurt pops - 1 small carton of greek yogurt, a little water/juice and a few fresh berries chopped up. They are the perfect size for littles!
customer_reviews.author: Chesney S.

customer_reviews.title: These are a fantastic size for young children
customer_reviews.text: These are a fantastic size for young children. they are small enough to eat quickly before the melting mess sets in but big enough for the user to be satiated by the flavor and quantity. It's also a larger set so when we have families over, there is plenty made for multiple kids.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the mini pop mold to my 7 year old daughter, and she absolutely loves it! She makes her own smoothies to turn into popsicles. We love the size and how easy they are to use!
customer_reviews.author: Fawnna

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kids size. My kids are 2 and 5 this is the perfect pop size for kids. I would say up to 6 years old. it's also a great size for adults to enjoy little ice pop. releases very easily from the mold. I just loved it and bought another one for when we have a party or so. I used it many times with different flavors and the flavors never mixed. easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulkader Babader

customer_reviews.title: Best Pop's ♡
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for pregnancy, looking to make electrolyte popsicles. These are perfect, I love the way they mold secure. Popping them out gives me great satisfaction. I highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 9 is just right
customer_reviews.text: these work great. found this brand from a sweethome review but chose this mold which makes 9 pops because we've got lots of neighborhood kids around and it just seemed like we'd be more likely not to have enough on hand with one of the 4-6 pop molds.
customer_reviews.author: superwesman

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them yet but love concept!!!
customer_reviews.text: Havent had a chance to use them yet, love the concept i am sure I will be very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to freeze home made baby food and juice with fresh fruit. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: svetikrusa

customer_reviews.title: Young Kids? You need this, trust me !
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic size for the kids! Easy to use and Easy to clean. We made juice pops, fruit pops, and yogurt pops so far. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BoxerDogMom

customer_reviews.title: Not Zoku
customer_reviews.text: Product name lies. Not Zoku branded item. However, that being said, works as it is supposed to and excellent sized popsicle for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M

customer_reviews.title: It is also SUPER easy to clean up and reuse
customer_reviews.text: Loving this. I make them using water "enhancer" and water, virtually no calories in the entire thing that way and gives me something to "eat" that's not at all caloric. It is also SUPER easy to clean up and reuse. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: these things are perfect and work very well
customer_reviews.text: these things are perfect and work very well. our toddler loves getting treats made with these, sometimes I make homemade juice or purrees for them, other times I used baby food and/or yogurt. Perfect size and less messy than others.
customer_reviews.author: ljamz

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! We got them for our toddler son, but honestly I think they are the perfect size for adults as well. We ended up buying the larger molds when he got a bit older, but ended up going back to these smaller ones because they are just the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: jannie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't possibly be any happier with this product. It makes perfect little pops that kids can pull straight out without running water over them to get them out, and the size is also perfect for little ones. I melt icecream and pour into molds, for a wonderful treat. Thanks Zoku!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, and perfectly tiny for small hands especially ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and perfectly tiny for small hands especially good for making frozen foods for an infant to try ... if they don't eat the whole thing at least it's not a big waste.
customer_reviews.author: S.F.

customer_reviews.title: Mess free
customer_reviews.text: The best mini popsicles. Because ethey are tiny, my kids and toddler can have them anywhere in the house that it won't make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: julianagara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good size
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. Easy to clean. The size is perfect, not too small and not too big. After having one, the kid can still have room for meal. Not affect the regular meals.
customer_reviews.author: cmom

customer_reviews.title: Love these mini pop moods
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking a long time for mini moulds. These are great as they just pop out so easily. Now I know that the kids won't fill up on these. A great treat/snack. My first recipe was chickpeas, apples, cinnamon, strawberries, greek yoghurt and a splash of milk. YUM and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Mum of 2

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these last year and have used them non stop even through the winter. We have a hard time getting our daughter to eat but if it comes in the popsicle form she is totally happy to have it. We make a green smoothie with lots of veggies and pour and freeze them and have a healthy eating tot!
customer_reviews.author: 88sweets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They freeze in about 4-6 hours usually. Perfect size pop for little ones. I have also used them without the "sticks" for ice cubes and freezing baby food. Anything goes!
customer_reviews.author: Mamasaurus2

customer_reviews.title: These are FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE these! Especially my 16 month old. The stick is perfect for little hands and the pop is just small enough to give them a treat without totally overloading them or ruining an upcoming meal. I love getting them out of the mold! And so does my 3 year old! So easy! These are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: KPVasq

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: the resulting pops are a little small, and the drip guard is not overly functional. But my 3 year-old son loved eating these in the summer, and helping me to make popsicles. We just used plain apple juice, which he liked, but could have gone fancier. Easy to clean--I just rinsed with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: E. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these!! Just be careful with the little holders... One of ours got destroyed in the garbage disposal :( we just used a mini popsicle stick instead and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. The popsicles are about the size of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. The popsicles are about the size of a golf ball. Small enough if my son changes his mind about wanting one that it isn't wasteful, also easy enough if he wants 2-3.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Moore

customer_reviews.title: freeze smoothies--baby explores food + senses and gets teething relief
customer_reviews.text: freeze smoothies--baby explores food + senses and gets teething relief
customer_reviews.author: sbdau

customer_reviews.title: If there were 6 stars, this would get them
customer_reviews.text: All popsicle molds are terrible. Except this one. GET THIS ONE, they pop right out with ZERO effort. The size is a great size for a snack for an adult or toddler, just the right size before it starts to melt. We put yogurt or kefir shakes in these and it was amazing. I can't wait to try more and more.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The pops are pretty small which is exactly what I was looking for. No problems removing the frozen treats from the mold. Couldn't ask for anything better!
customer_reviews.author: Pianist9221

customer_reviews.title: Cute little popsicles
customer_reviews.text: This popsicle mold set makes adorable little spherical popsicles that are a great size for a toddler, although even my older kids like to have them. We tend to use orange juice, and it comes out fine. The popsicles easily pop out of the mold as long as they have been thoroughly frozen.
customer_reviews.author: AnselsMom

product_meta.title: Zoku Mini Pop Molds, 9 Miniature Popsicle Molds With Sticks and Drip-guards, Easy-release BPA-free Silicone
feature_bullets: NINE MINIATURE POPSICLES: The compact tray creates 9 mini pops simultaneously; about 0.6-fluid ounces each

EASY TO USE DESIGN: Silicone molds easily release your pops from the polypropylene base, no inverting required; simply pull out your mini pop and enjoy; no need to run under warm water; each mold includes a stick with drip guard for mess-free enjoyment
NOT JUST FOR POPSICLES: This product doubles as a candy mold; use melted chocolate or candy instead of fruit juice to create lollipops
UNIQUE SIZE: Mini pops are just the right proportion for kids' appetites and a guilt-free treat for adults; perfect for parties

BPA-FREE AND EASY TO CLEAN: BPA and phthalate free polypropylene and silicone design is easy to use and clean; do not wash in the dishwasher; clean with mild soap and water; designed in the USA; made in China

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,028 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
